instructions: In FaceTime, tap the Add button at the top right. Type the name or number you want to call in the entry field at the top, then tap Video to make a video call or tap Audio to make a FaceTime audio call (not available in all countries or regions). You can also tap the Add Contact button to open Contacts and start your call from there, or tap a contact in your list of FaceTime calls to quickly make a call.
In the Messages conversation, tap the profile picture, the My Account button , or the name at the top of the conversation. Tap FaceTime.

Image titled Stop Sharing Your Location on an iPhone Step 1 1 Tap the app. This is a green button with a white chat bubble, usually found on the main home screen. Image titled Stop Sharing Your Location on an iPhone Step 2 2 Tap the message that is currently sharing your location. Image titled Stop Sharing Your Location on an iPhone Step 3 3 Tap the blue circle with an i . This button is in the top right of the screen. Image titled Stop Sharing Your Location on an iPhone Step 4 4 Tap . This will be in red text below Send My Current Location . Image titled Stop Sharing Your Location on an iPhone Step 5 5 Tap . Your location will no longer be shared with this person. Advertisement

Image titled Stop Sharing Your Location on an iPhone Step 6 1 Open your iPhone's Settings. It's an app that appears as gray cogs, which can usually be found on one of your home screens. If you can't find the app on one of your home screens, it may be in a folder labeled . Image titled Stop Sharing Your Location on an iPhone Step 7 2 Tap . It's located at the end of the third section. Image titled Stop Sharing Your Location on an iPhone Step 8 3 Tap . It's the first option, at the top of the menu. Image titled Stop Sharing Your Location on an iPhone Step 9 4 Slide the button next to Location Services to the Off position. The space to the right of the button should be white. Now your location will not be shared with any apps. This function can always be re-enabled by sliding the button to the On position (the space to the left of the button will turn green). Note that location services is required for many apps to function properly (such as GPS tracking). You can also enable or disable Location Services for specific apps (in the list below the Share My Location option). Advertisement
